34  {

36  }
37  else

40  }

42  }

44  {

46  }
47  static std::string errorCode2Message(AsymmetricCipherException::ErrorCode errorCode)
48  {
49  std::string ret;
50  switch (errorCode)
51  {
52  case AsymmetricCipherException::UNKNOWN:

54  break;
55  case AsymmetricCipherException::ENCRYPTING_DATA:
56  ret = "Encrypting data";
57  break;
58  case AsymmetricCipherException::DECRYPTING_DATA:

64  }
